metadata.title: CVE-2018-10111 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GEGL through 0.3.32. The render_rectanglefunction in process/gegl-processor.c has unbounded memory allocation,leading to a denial of service (application crash) upon allocation failure.

criterions.comment: gegl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
